title: Elegant Sapphire and Diamond Haaram - Modern Twist on a Classic
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Features a vibrant Oval-Cut Sapphire of exceptional clarity
surrounded by meticulously set baguette and round-cut Diamonds. Certified Diamonds with VS clarity and G color. Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram, this piece showcases a linear progression of baguette-cut diamonds leading to a stunning oval Sapphire centerpiece. The sapphire is bezel-set and framed by a halo of round-cut diamonds, creating a radiant focal point. The streamlined design allows for comfortable wear while exuding sophisticated elegance.
occasions: and contemporary Indian celebrations. Can also be paired with modern ethnic wear or evening gowns for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This necklace is a perfect blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The vibrant sapphire commands attention, while the meticulously set diamonds add unparalleled sparkle. Its contemporary style ensures versatility, making it a cherished piece for generations to come. A certificate of authenticity is included, guaranteeing the quality of the gold and gemstones.
